blogPost.title: Journalism, particularly at the highest level, is about raw power

localize.title: 新闻工作，尤其是最高级别的新闻工作，讲究的是生力军。

previous.excerpt:
Coinbase Global made public on Thursday the prospectus for its much-anticipated
initial public offering, setting up the company to possibly launch its IPO in
March.

Coinbase, whose mission is to create an open financial system for everyone,
plans to use a direct listing to tap the public equities…

localize.title: Coinbase最快可能在今年3月上市

Coinbase Global周四公开了其备受关注的招股说明书。
首次公开募股，为该公司可能会在
3月份。

Coinbase，其使命是为每个人建立一个开放的金融体系。
计划采用直接上市的方式来挖掘公众股...

localize.title: Coinbase最快可能在今年3月上市
localize.the_new_excerpt:
Coinbase Global週四公開了其備受關注的招股說明書。
